title: The Amazing colossal man
creator_credit: Dominic Falcone and Yellow Ball Workshop
brief_description: Under the eye of their instructor, Yvonne Andersen, children between the ages of five and twel ve created this animated film while students at the workshop in 1964. No other credits available.
